LBCASE LB Address: East Dorincourt Kingston HillLB Grade: LOCALLB Ref: 34

decision_conditions: The submitted Fire Safety Statement does not include all of the relevant details to satisfy policy D12A of the London Plan (2021) and only includes limited/generic basic information with insufficient detail or plans, specific to the site/development. It therefore does not demonstrate that the development would be safe for its lifetime and, as such, this condition cannot be discharged.
description: Details required for Condition 4 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/02356/HOU (Alteration to roof with half pitched, half flat to existing side extension. installation of new pvc gutter to connect to existing hoppers.)
